author: alkebulan.alliance
title: Banking the "Unbanked"
description: Creating the opportunity for home grown solutions for the 4 billion "unbanked" in the developing world.
importance: External solutions are unlikely to solve problems. The "unbanked" know what their problems are and have solutions of their own.
success: Practical solutions to create knowledge, build confidence, break down barriers to opportunity and take charge of the future.
